name: Thermometer
description: Client is an elderly person with multiple medical conditions. She is unemployed and is unable to a thermometer for use for the family.

name: Blood Glucose Meter
description: Client is an elderly person with multiple medical conditions. She is unemployed and is unable to afford a blood sugar measuring meter to monitor her blood sugar level

name: Hospital Bed
description:
Helping a senior who is a caregiver for her old-aged husband to look for a second-hand working hospital bed. The bed which her husband is sleeping now is too low and requires the senior to exert great strength (which hurt her back) to transfer him out of the bed for showering or toileting.

Thanks.

name: Oximeter
description: Looking for a donor to donate few set of Oximeter for our clients. Our clients are Cancer patient and majority are elderly with low income background. Most of them overlook about the free Oximeter given by government. It helps for them to monitor their oxygen level and heart rate at current situation.

name: Lifree Diapers (XL)
description:
Client struggling with medical issues that cause her to dependent on diapers. Due to lack of funds, she is unable to get the correct quantity of diapers - hence limiting her mobility.
She lives with her husband, who also has medical issues and cannot work, living in a rental unit with financial assistance. Looking for donations of XL size Lifree Pull up diapers to assist family.

name: Diapers (Lifree)
description: Recently divorced elderly, 70 years old, requires assistance with getting diapers as she is unable to afford them on her own. Due to her recent change in marital status, she is no longer supported by her children or ex-husband, leaving her with rental and bill arrears. Hoping to find a donor who would be able to sponsor some adult diapers so she may alleviate costs for her medical needs. She prefers Lifree brand as it does not cause discomfort to her.

name: ART kit
description:
For clients from low-income family with children of age 5 -21 years old. With more testing needed during the current phase, low-income families would have difficulties affording more test kits, especially families with many children or families with young and old.

Donor could send the test kit to SHINE Children & Youth Services (Clementi):
329 Clementi Ave 2, 
#01-248, 
Singapore 120329

contact.org: SHINE Children and Youth Services - Clementi
contact.name: Gwen Ho

name: Commode (collapsible)
description: Family has a elderly aunt who recently got into a car accident and requires a commode (foldable) urgently. She was previously the sole breadwinner and the family is unable to afford a new commode. Preferably foldable/collapsible as the flat toilet is small.

name: Walking frame
description: Family has a elderly aunt who recently got into a car accident and requires a walking frame urgently for her mobility. She was previously the sole breadwinner and the family is unable to afford a walking frame.

name: Foot Bike
description: Client has a medical condition which affects his mobility and is certified medically unfit for work. A foot bike will greatly benefit him as he can exercise at home to strengthen his leg muscles and mobility.

name: Motorized wheelchair
description:
An elderly client of Thye Hua Kwan Moral Charities (THKMC) Mr A, has recently been diagnosed with decompensated cardiac failure (disorder). The client ambulates around the community with his manual wheelchair, but due to his weak heart condition, it has affected his arms’ strength to push himself around. 
 
On behalf of the client, THKMC is seeking a donation of a motorized wheelchair, foldable if possible, to assist Mr A on ambulating around the community. 
   
If you know of someone who has the item for donation, please contact Case Worker Anthony at 96546542 or email: anthony.wang@thkmc.org.sg. We appreciate it if the donor could deliver the item to the client’s home directly at Blk 257 Ang Mo Kio Ave 4. For more information on THKMC, do visit: https://www.thkmc.org.sg

contact.org: THK Cluster Support @ Ang Mo Kio
contact.name: Anthony Wang

name: Mobility Scooter
description:
Client is not mobile due to the multiple health conditions, including a tumour in her knee. Being a mother of young children, it has been challenging for her to manage the household by herself. Her husband helps out at home but recently, he was diagnosed with arthritis and this had also affected his mobility. Due to the couple’s poor health, they have not been able to run errands and they are also not able to send their 4-year-old to school. There are concerns that the child’s development may be affected if she continues to not have the opportunity to attend school. There are no breadwinners in the family due to their health issues. They are heavily dependent on the financial assistance from the Social Service Office to make ends meet. 

Mobility scooter (preferably for two passenger so that client’s husband can send their child to school)

name: Wheelchair Big Size
description: Elderly woman (73 years old) staying alone in Spooner Road, she needs a big size wheelchair for her to move about doing her daily chores.

name: Rollator
description: 70years old lady has limited mobility, she has to use wheelchair for long distances, she wants to have a rollator to practice walking so that she is able to walk more stably and be able to sit when she needs to rest.

name: Wheelchair
description: 65 years old Chinese female married and staying with her husband and daughter. Client is mostly homebound and is alone at home during the day, she experiences breathlessness whenever she ambulates in the Community. A wheelchair will help her to move around in the community.

name: wheelchair
description: Client and husband are both low-income earners, with 4 children, all aged below 16 years old. Their eldest son had recently injured himself, and recovery period is expected to be at least 6 months. The family had been encouraged to get a wheelchair to help with his mobility, but the family is unable to afford it. They are thus hoping to get a wheelchair to ease their son's recovery.(Kamie)
specifications: Able to withstand more than 105 kg

contact.org: THK Family Service Centre @ Bedok North
contact.name: Teddy Fu

name: Motorised Scooter
description:
Client is a cancer patient and staying alone. Client has some mobility issues. Thus, having a motorised scooter will allow client to go about his daily activities.

Note: Client can only use a motorised scooter that is able to support 100-150kg   in weight.

name: Laptop
description: Client is a low-income single-mother. Her laptop spoilt after using it for around 12 years and needs a laptop to search for and make job applications online.

contact.org: AMKFSC Community Services Ltd - Cheng San
contact.name: Charmaine Lim

name: Used Laptop x 2 pcs
description:
We are seeking of 2 used laptops.

One of the laptop, we hope to use and support one of our residents, who just recently completed program and continue with us for his rehabilitation. He is known as Jed Lim. He will be attending a few months course on agriculture that is conducted by NTUC learning hub.  

The second laptop will be for one of our existing staffs daughter. She will be using in her study. The staff, Mr Ang, has been with us for more than 10 years. He is an overcomer and exiting one of our operation staffs. 
We run a home providing drug rehabilitation and after-care services to male drug addicts and ex-offenders in Singapore. This is a residential programme carried out in our agency home, which was graciously provided by the Singapore government in recognition of our services to the community. WE have total about 80 to 90 in house stay of residents and staffs. The Helping Hand is a Volunteer Welfare Organization affiliated with the National Council of Social Service.

name: Laptop
description: A family of 4 requires a working laptop with camera functions to attend zoom meetings and courses online from home. Single mother is the sole breadwinner and main caregiver for the family. The family currently does not have any laptop/tablets because they are financially strained. They rely on their mobile phones to assess any online documents and attend zoom meetings but finds it a great challenge to do so.  Interested donors kindly contact annachan@carecorner.org.sg

contact.org: Care Corner Family Service Centre - Admiralty
contact.name: Juanna Sia

name: Laptop
description: A family has two school going children required a laptop to do homework, projects etc. The family is facing financial struggles and their current ones have spoiled.

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Service Centre @ Yew Tee
contact.name: Fu Xiu Ting

name: Laptop
description:
Client is currently homeless and is hoping to get a laptop for better access to services and products. He hopes that he can explore other alternative employment options 
(i.e. survey, web designer) as well.

name: iPad
description: Grandson (age17) in the care of grandparents, living in rental unit. Request for iPad to assist in school work.

name: Laptop
description:
The client suffers from mental health issues, and requires a laptop for 2 main reasons. First, he would need to utilize it for video counselling. Second, he needs it for his religious studies where most programmes have been moved online.

Interested donors kindly contact ruebenyue@carecorner.org.sg

contact.org: Care Corner Family Service Centre - Admiralty
contact.name: Juanna Sia

name: Tablets with 4G function
description: Our research unit are in need of 4 numbers of tablets to use for upcoming data collection with family participants. Tablets can come with 4G function and able to access Wifi/mobile data to connect to the internet. No specific brand and second hand is welcomed as long as the tablet is decently usable (not extremely laggy) and can be used to access the internet via wifi/data. Preferably a screen size of 8-inch and above. Unfortunately tablets will be needed as a laptop would not be ideal as it is not portable or touch-screen. The items will be sent to the centre and please contact us for delivery details (email: dik@childrensociety.org.sg, contact: 9436 7401). Thank you for your kind and generous support.

name: Laptop
description: Client's son is having his PSLE examinations this year. Son would benefit from having his own laptop as he is sharing with his sibling currently during their HBL. He would benefit from having his own laptop so that he can utilise it for his own learning and preparation for his PSLE examinations. For further liaisons on delivery etc, do contact me at 98598768, thank you.

name: MORRIES Stand Fan 18 inches
description: Family of 8 has been experiencing financial stressors as the father is sole breadwinner. His wife is unable to work as she has health issues. She also needs to caregive for the children. They have adolescent and pre-school children. Family’s standing fan is spoilt. Replacement will greatly lessen financial burden and provide cooling comfort during this hot season.

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Service Centre @ Champions Way
contact.name: Joycelyn Wong

name: Food rations
description:
Young married couple is caring for a preschool child. Husband has lost his job recently and thus family has lost their main income. Looking for food rations to tide the family through a difficult time.

(Will specify type of rations, once contacted. Thank you)

name: Food rations
description:
Single mother with low-income is supporting her elderly mother and three children. Looking for food rations to tide the family through a difficult time.

(Will specify food rations once contacted, thank you)

name: Smart Phone (iPhone preferred)
description: Client is an elderly single male staying in a rental flat. Currently unemployment and seeking to find job. As rental flat does not have a home line, seeking job is challenging without a phone. Current phone was damaged due to an accident in a park and client is used to iPhone and does not know how to operate Android phones.

name: balloons
description: We are looking for donation of cartoon balloons and helium to help cheer children in the hospital.

name: handphone in good condition
description: Client is earning low income and her handphone is having issues. It will be helpful if she can be granted with a second-hand handphone, so that she can contact and to be contacted in case of emergency or work-related matters.

contact.org: AMKFSC Community Services Ltd - Cheng San
contact.name: Janetta Tan

name: Toilet Training Seat
description: Ct is a single father who has a 4+ year old son. Ct is working part-time. Ct's son is not toilet trained yet, he avoids using the toilet as he is afraid of falling into the toilet bowl. Ct requests for a toilet training seat as it would reduce his son's fears greatly. Please contact Ms Tan Limin at 63260308 if you require further clarifications. Thank you!

name: Laptop
description: Family of 3 with young child diagnosed with special needs. Family currently owns a tablet but it has some speaker and mic issues that makes online therapy sessions for child challenging. The family would like to request for a secondhand laptop for child's educational needs as they have been trying to save money to purchase one but have difficulty in doing so.

contact.org: Fei Yue - Early Intervention Centre For Children
contact.name: Tessa Nai

name: Milk Powder (Similac Stage 3)
description: Family of 7, couple with 5 children requires short-term milk powder support. Father is the sole breadwinner and has not been working for the past one week as he was feeling unwell after vaccination. He works as a grab food delivery staff which affect the family financial situation. Wife is not working as she need to take care of the children at home.

name: Milk Powder (1.2kg)
description: Our home need 20 packets of 1.2kg Milk powder (Everyday Brand) for our 522 elderly residents. Thank you

contact.org: Ju Eng Home For Senior Citizens
contact.name: Lee Jun Hui

name: Food Rations
description:
We're hoping to collect food rations and household necessities donations for several families and stay-alone elderly.
The donations will be placed in our centre and given to our clients who needs assistance.

name: Groceries
description:
Family with three children are facing financial difficulties and staying in a backpackers inn. They would require some groceries: Eggs, cheese, paratha, marigold milk, mineral water, F&N mango and apple juice. 

They would also need some stationery items for their children: Pencils, Markers, Mild liners, English notebook, artbook, sharpeners, paint brushes and paint (pastel colours).

name: Fumigation Fees
description: Female adult in her late fifties require support to pay for fumigation for her HDB rental flat as there are bed bugs at home. She is unable to work due to medical conditions and her children also have financial concerns, unable to pay for the fumigation fees of $120.

name: Food Ration
description:
Elderly woman with unemployed daughter due to health issues require Vegetarian food rations.
Family do not take Garlic, Onion and Ginger.

1. Basmati Rice 5 Kg

name: eBike
description: A family with a toddler staying in their rental flat. Father is working as a delivery rider and his income fluctuates according to the availability of orders. They are tapping on financial support in order to make their ends meet. Father’s electric bicycle is not working and he requires one which is LTA approved to continue support the family. A second-hand one is perfect!

contact.org: Montfort Care - Kreta Ayer Family Services
contact.name: Chua Pei Ching

name: Ensure Milk Powder
description: Client is a senior with multiple health conditions. She has been recommended by her doctor to include Ensure Milk as part of her diet given its nutritional value. However, due to her limited finances, she is unable to afford the milk powder. Thus, client would like to request for donations of 6 tins of Ensure Milk Powder (Wheat flavour), which should last her for about 3 months.

contact.org: Care Corner Family Service Centre - Toa Payoh
contact.name: Joey Yong

name: Digital Camera
description: We are planning to conduct second run of photography group work. This run we are targetting at socially isolated and male seniors. We hope to tap on modality of photography as a platform to encourage participants to step out of their home, alleviate their anxieties and improve their quality of life. We would require 8 to 10 digital cameras (with charger)in mint condition. Please contact me at 96546514. Thank you.

name: Motorised scooter
description: An elderly client is requesting for a motorized scooter as his previous motorized scooter has broken down for a while and he is unable to walk with a steady gait after inserting 10 screws in his back and leg when he fell from the 2nd floor in 1989 when he was working as an aircon electrician. He is permanently unfit for work and requires a motorized scooter to allow him to travel further in place of his wheelchair as he feels very trapped and isolated in his rental unit.

description: Client is a single mother with 2 children, and the sole provider and caregiver in the family. Her washing machine is currently spoilt. The family is staying at a rental flat and is saving up to shift into their HDB purchase flat. The washing machine will be vital for their basic daily needs.

contact.org: MWS Covenant Family Service Centre - Hougang

name: Television
description: Family seeking a donation for a television as their current one was given previously by a friend but is breaking down.

name: Fridge
description: Client and husband form a low-income household with their 3 children. Her husband is the sole breadwinner while client takes on a part-time course while juggling her caregiving responsibilities. Recently, their fridge broke down, which affects their ability to keep food for longer periods of time. This means that at times, their food or meals are spoiled, which adds further burden to their financial constraints. Having a replacement fridge would thus ensure that their basic needs are met adequately daily. Halal fridge required, preferably new.

name: Washing Machine
description: My client is an senior on long term MC from IMH hence he is unable to work. His current washing machine has been spoilt for some time.

name: Washing Machine Needed! (Top Load)
description: Client is a single mother, and the sole provider for her 3 school-going children.  Client earns a minimal income from her part-time employment, and as a result, the family experiences financial strains. The family requires a washing machine as their current one is faulty.

name: Television
description: A family of 6 living in rental flat and depending on husband's low wages for daily needs. Client does not have financial to purchase a television as their current one spoiled.

name: Bicycle (adult)

Single mother is working but is unable to afford a new bicycle for her daughter. Appreciate if donor can deliver as family is unable to pay for delivery. Thank you!

name: Adult Bicycle
description: Client is a 62 male who is currently homeless and sleeping in the open. Client is seeking employment but worries about transport and hopes to have a working bicycle so he can cycle to work. Client is familiar with foldable bicycle or MTB.

name: Kitchen Cabinet
description: A single parent with a school going child requires a kitchen cabinet with a countertop as her existing one is quite worn out. A kitchen cabinet would help the family to be able to keep their pots and pans in a proper place as family resides in a rental flat with limited space.

name: Super Single Bedframe

name: Queen-sized mattress and bed frame
description: Single mother with three school-going children requires a queen-sized mattress and bed frame. Their rental flat is barely furnished with not much furniture. She is working full-time but unable to afford a new bed. Appreciate if donor can deliver/pay for dleivery. Thank you.

name: Cupboard
description: My client needs a cupboard to hang his clothes. He has not been working for more than 20 years due to his health. He lives in a rental flat

name: Kitchen Cabinet
description: Client is an elderly residing with her 11-year-old grandson in a rental flat. Due to a recent decline in her health, she is no longer able to work to support the household financially. Her current kitchen cabinet is faulty and she therefore requires an appropriate space to place her dishware and other household necessities. Given her financial situation, she is unable to afford the replacement. She and her grandson would greatly benefit from it to improve the state of their rental unit and their quality of life.

name: Kitchen Rack
description: Client is 60plus who is staying alone in a rental flat. Client has to throw away her kitchen rack which was infested by bugs. Client prefers to cook for herself than buying outside food.

name: Kitchen Cabinet
description: Family of 5 living in a 1-room rental flat. Single mother who has no source of income is the main caregiver to a newborn and 3 young children. Family's current kitchen cabinet is already in a bad condition thus family is seeking for any kind donation of a kitchen cabinet. Do contact me at 98598768 for further liaison on delivery address etc, thank you very much.

name: Kitchen Cabinet
description:
Our client is a 59 year old living in a rental flat with multiple chronic conditions. 
She requires further help with financial assistance, and is unable to work due to her medical conditions

name: Kitchen Rack
description: Client is a single mother of 3 young children age between 3 to 8 years old. Client and her children had suffered a period of homelessness and have not have a stable housing for the past 8 years. In late September, HDB has allocated them a rental unit. As this is client’s first home, she does not have the necessities and furniture for her house. Unfortunately, she had also left her job as a cleaner recently as she had to look after her children when they fall ill often. Client is dependent on the financial assistance from the Social Service Office and she is also looking for a suitable employment now.

name: King size bed with mattress and storage
description:
Client is the sole breadwinner supporting her family of 7 (5 young children). Client and her family are living in rental flat and client is a low wage income earner. Client requires a king size bed (preferable with storage function as they live in 2 room rental flat) mattress and bed sheet as the current one has sunken in and client is unable to afford. Appreciate if bed sheet is new as client has young children.
-only want King size bed with mattress only.
